text: Beauty has been democratised. No longer the preserve of movie stars and models but available to all. But while the invitation to beauty is welcomed, it has become not so much an option as an imperative.
author: Susie Orbach

text: Beauty is the oracle that speaks to us all.
author: Luis Barragan

text: The real beauty of it - key to my life was playing key chords on a banjo. For somebody else it may be a golf club that mom and dad put in their hands or a baseball or ballet lessons. Real gift to give to me and put it in writing.
author: Vince Gill

text: In the 19th century, you had bourgeois art without politics - an almost frozen idea of what beauty is.
author: Douglas Sirk
